sentence.Network_en: Veuve Clicquot is then carefully shipped around the world to discerning customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 尤乌·克里括香槟然后被小心地运往世界各地,供富于鉴赏力的顾客享用.

sentence.Network_en: France's Champagne region, for instance, helps give Veuve Clicquot special cachet.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如法国香槟区就给[凯歌皇牌]特别的尊贵象徵.

sentence.Network_en: Veuve Clicquot is produced to the highest standards.
sentence.Network_cn: 尤乌·里括香槟酒是按最高的标准生产的.
